summary:
I bring a lot of experience in how to manage, organise, restructure and run a business. Thanks to my 15 years+ account management experience in (digital) advertising and being the managing director of an advertising agency for 3 years and setting up shop for a UK company in the Netherlands, I bring a lot experience to the table.

I am a skilled senior manager with an entrepreneurial spirit. I am a brand ambassador, lover of creating and developing a brand experience, driven by passion for the industry and the beauty of brands.

awards.title: Webby Award
awards.description:
Case: Metropole Tweetphony (October 2012)
Awarded in the category "Entertainment"

Case: DS5 Twitter Race (November 2011)
special honors for 'Best use of Online Media' and 'Best use of Social Media'; thus listed twice in the top 15% of all 10.000 submissions across 60 countries (webbyawards.com).

projects.title: Strategy, UX and design of the new Nescafe.nl
projects.description: Nescafe is a very popular coffee brand which is all about enjoying and celebrating life. Part of the corporate rebranding of Nescafe early 2014, Publicis played a large role in determining the User Experience of the new nescafe.nl. Well thought strategy, UX and designs led to a mobile first website representing Nescafe as the young, joyful brand.

projects.title: Strategy, UX and design of the new maggi.nl
projects.description: Maggi wanted to rebrand their corporate website and focus more on the consumer needs. Publicis, as the brand responsible, played a large role in determine the new strategy, user experience including persona's, wireframes and design guidance. We worked alongside MediaMonks and established to launch the new site by the end of 2014.

projects.title: Metropole Orkest, Metropole Tweetphony
projects.description:
A unique production that combines live music and Twitter. On www.tweetphony.nl people were able to compose a short music track of 140 characters and send this tweet. Out of over 2500 tweets, the best musical tweets were reworked by 9 arrangers all over the world into a one minute track and played live by the 52 headed orchestra. The video of each Tweetphony was send to the composer directly after playing. The entire concert lasted for 8 hours and was streamed live on the website.

This case is awarded with a Golden and Silver Cannes Lion, a Webby Award, 2 silver SpinAwards, a Golden and Silver ADCN and many more (summery below at Honors & Awards).

projects.title: Citroen DS5 Twitter Race
projects.description:
1 day event: introduction of the new DS5. 

Gameplay: navigate the DS5 to your door by sharing tweets with a special campaign hashtag or though the Facebook application. The DS5 drove through the country, based on directions shared by those tweets. A camera was mounted on the back seat of the car and streamed on the website. 

Communication: Facebook application with integrated Twitter Feed, Live Stream video and Google maps

The DS5 TwitterRace is ranked by Advertising Age within the top 10 Best Social Media campaigns 2011

projects.title: 2-minutenverhalen (unforgettable 2 minutes)
projects.description:
Every year in the Netherlands we have World War II remembrance day on May 4th and we celebrate our freedom on May 5th. However, after 78 years, the first generation of soldiers, heroes and victims are slimming down. But we should never forget the horror of the war. Therefore we launched a new long term platform campaign with the key message: Keep the war stories alive, share them! 
We produced over fifteen 2-minute stories, told by 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th generation war victims and heroes. On Spotify and radio (in program and commercials) we shared their stories. Supported by a TV, radio, video, social, outdoor and digital campaign. We also got a lot of PR attention in dutch TV and radioshows: stories were read out loud or played and people talked about the importance of sharing the stories. 

We encouraged people to share their story so we never forget. And so they did...

projects.title: Employer brand government: strategy, guidelines, campaign format, video & photography
projects.description: We created a complete new employer brand for the dutch government. From strategy (EVP, values, payoff) to design for all ATL, BTL social and digital communication activities, guided through a guideline manual book and templates. Through extensive stakeholder management and research, we managed to kick off a government wide supported employer brand proposition and look & feel, which is succesfuly rolled out through social media, a brand video and outdoor per October 2022.

projects.title: Renault Laad Me (bronze Esprix, #7 in the top40 advertising music charge, SAN nominations)
projects.description: Driving electric brings freedom to all. So why not bring an ode to freedom by dedicating a song to driving electric Renault-vehicles: Laad Me. We composed the song and launched it on radio & Spotify along with other music streaming platforms. To support the song, we launched a 360 campaign from TV to showroom POS and a PR campaign on the radio with interviews with the upcoming talent and singer Marielle Flens.

projects.title: Patientenvereniging Hoofd Hals Kanker (SAN en ADCN nominaties)
projects.description: Head and neck cancer is in the top 10 of the most common cancers in the Netherlands. But, since this cancer has symptoms similar to a normal cold, people mostly ignore them which can be fatal. Paying attention and knowing the symptoms are therefor crucial. That’s why we introduced during the Make Sense week: Oplettanol, the first remedy against head and neck cancer. This is a play on the word “Opletten”, which means paying attention in Dutch. The PR campaign was launched in a place where people come with similar complaints: the drugstore. The specially designed medicin packaging contains a leaflet with information from experts across Europe. With this knowledge, people can spot the symptoms of head and neck cancer faster. A nation wide PR and earned media campaign is launched with patients sharing their stories and health care institutions displaying the package and posters/flyers.

projects.title: Nachtkasjesconcert Classic NL (zilveren spinaward)
projects.description: Based on the strategic insight that 1 out of 4 people have problems falling asleep because they scroll through their feeds in bed. Fact is, you can fall asleep and sleep better when classic music is played. Therefore we launched the night stand concert. A concert played on your phone, brought to life through a hologram. Classic NL (radio station) incorporated the night stand concert into their program during the evening. We reached a younger audience and managed to increase the number of listeners.

projects.title: UX strategy & redesign Liberty Global website
projects.description: From a component based platform thinking we were redesigning the global website of Liberty Global along with consulting in development sprints of the brands/countries such as Ziggo (NL), the UK and Germany. Organising workshops and designsprints was one of my key tasks.

projects.title: everywheretwingo.nl
projects.description:
The platform is all about the lifestyle of the new Renault Twingo. We've created this platform in order to nurture leads and show the world the new Twingo is all about fashion, beauty, design and career. 

The platform is updated every week with new content, carefully selected from the internet and created a dedicated blogger/curator and ourselves. Also the platform is an intelligent platform. We customize the content and newsletters based on browse behavior of the visitor. 

Due to careful nurturing and the interesting content for the target group, conversion and sales doubled! Therefore this project won the bronze Esprix award.

projects.title: introduction new Renault Espace
projects.description:
for the introduction of the new Renault Espace, we've developed a local strategy which was rolled out in a 360 campaign. The local strategy consisted of setting up a profile of the target group and determine the 360 red line communication, means, tone & style and planning. 

The Espace is launched with the red line communication of "stimulate your senses" which was integrated into video, CRM, online, a platform, BTL, dealer and print. Topped off with an extensive partnership with the Nederlands Dans Theater including shows, POS, special formats online and print and CRM.  

The campaign was nominated for the Dutch Branded Content & Sponsor Award.

projects.title: all-in-one tool: calculate your personal offer
projects.description: an interactive tool for leads and prospects to calculate their personal All-in-One offer. For this project I determined the strategy and UX alongside the strategic planner and UX-designer. In production, I played a key role in interaction design, functional design and CRM follow up intelligence.

projects.title: introduction new Renault Twingo
projects.description: With the introduction of the new Renault Twingo, Renault wanted to target a younger buyers profile with fashionable, ambitious woman. So, we've developed an introduction campaign with focus on CRM.  The core of the campaign was the lead nurture platform everywheretwingo.nl: an intelligent platform serving the visitors custom content based on their interests. The means created around the platform, helped to target these young, fashionable woman by also making media partners, tone & style and message relevant for them. The campaign also included a partnership with the Holland's Next Top model television program and the election of the most ambitious woman of the Netherlands with VIVA400. The campaign proves to be a success, since we achieved a massive growth of younger, female prospects, doubled sales compared to traditional campaigns and an impressive number of high engaged visitors of the platform.

profile_positions.description: Managing and coaching the account team in the process of becoming a client centric organization.
profile_positions.title: Director of Client Services

profile_positions.description: Launching new brand campaign and topical campaign for Beter Bed and Lidl consisting of radio, TV and digital advertising.
profile_positions.title: Director of Client Services

profile_positions.description: Setting up a new way of working for a global agency, specialized in video content. I introduced a workload planning flow, new processes relating to internal briefings, quality control and reports on capacity and project planning.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
In my role as business/ managing director and member of Publicis Groupe’s management team, my focus is to establish a tailor made service to our clients, integrated way of working between practices and play a role in the NL Groupe's growth. I am business responsible for the creative and influence practice (Publicis, Leo Burnett): managing and overseeing revenue, profit, employees, costs, growth, leading role in pitches (profit and non-profit) and business development plans.

In addition I am the client lead on various clients: the Dutch Government, non-profit organisations, tech companies such as ASML and automotive like Renault. We develop their (global) brand, behavioral, awareness, tactical and labor market campaigns. 

We are the Dutch / worldwide (lead) agency producing corporate, brand, advertising and employer brand (recruitment) campaigns. We work in multidisciplinary teams, one client lead, one P&L.
profile_positions.title: Business/ Managing Director Publicis & Leo Burnett NL

profile_positions.description:
In the role of Client Lead I was working alongside the managing director on various clients, assist in running the business (people to revenue) and new business pitches and/or opportunities.

Renault is my main client. We are their brand partner and lead agency of all ATL, BTL, local, digital and CRM activities. From strategy to concept to production, taking the role as a brand coordinator and gatekeeper for all stakeholders. We challenge the brand, brand and business KPI's, but also the quality of the deliverables. Playing a key role in development and growth of the Renault brand and its overall opinion.
profile_positions.title: Client Lead / Client Service Director

profile_positions.description:
ROLE:
As the Country Manager of Nomensa, I was in charge of establishing their first abroad office. Next to arraigning all requirements that come along with starting a new office, I helped to grow their digital offering and awareness in the Netherlands. Working alongside the UK team, we combined efforts in business development, local pitches and adding local insights into i.e. our client service department, like for our client Liberty Global. In addition, I deepened relationships with the growing digital community in the Netherlands and started a recruitment program for local talent to join the team. The key was to preserve and extend the culture of Nomensa in Amsterdam and establish the agency as a creative UX force in the European marketplace.

COMPANY PROFILE:
Established in 2001, Nomensa are a strategic digital design agency that combines expertise in psychology, interaction design and technology to transform digital experiences. Across our 3 offices in Bristol, London and Amsterdam we house around 100 experts who work hard to understand people and the emotional response to design. We believe human experience is everything and this philosophy is shared by an extensive range of high profile clients such as Sky, The National Trust, Royal Mail, Red Cross, Atradius and Liberty Global.
profile_positions.title: Country Manager

profile_positions.description:
I was the digital project lead on Nestle, Nescafe, Maggi, and Randstad. We delivered their digital strategy and UX, campaigns and (social media) activations. 

Next to that I was the Account Director of the Renault Netherlands account managing a team that consisted of 3 Account Managers, 2 project managers, strategic planner, creative teams and studio. Due to a long term relationship with this client, we were their strategic and business partner playing a key role in managing internal and external stakeholders.

SUMMERY
- strong digital focus (over 70% of daily work)
- brand communication and strategies
- strategic brand partner for the client
- manage the scope of work on a daily, quarterly and yearly basis
- key role within the 360 brand team with brand image responsibilities
- brand and campaign advertising, digital first approach
- strategic omni-channel messaging and journey 
- co-create (campaign) websites and platforms
profile_positions.title: Account Director

profile_positions.description:
main clients: Citroën (automotive), Metropole Orkest (non-profit), Ferrero: Kinder Bueno, Nutella, TicTac (retail, FMCG), Air France 

Account management of both large and smaller accounts. The campaigns I have helped developed consisted of TV, press, radio, online (flash banners, rich media), social media-campaigns and events, activations, events, POS
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
ID of inc-21: B2B, HR, internal communication. Partner of FHV BBDO.

Projectmanagement of advertising campaings for the largest Dutch telecom company KPN: print, outdoor, TV, radio, promotions/activations.
